price: 23. En zijn metgezel (de engel) zal zeggen: “Dit is wat ik van hem aan daden genoteerd heb”
arabic: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَٰذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: waqāla qarīnuhu hādhā mā ladayya ʿatīdun
